name: Detective Shrooms Playtest
description:
Mushtown is known as a quiet, peaceful place. But even the calmest villages have their mysteries! Thankfully, Detective Shrooms is on the case.

Detective Shrooms is a 2D point & click game, in which the players need to interact with the villagers and investigate their surroundings to find out the truth behind a mystery. Players will use dialogue menu options to discover context clues to solve the game’s main mystery: Is tomato a fruit?

Press the space bar to walk through the dialogue or simply click on the screen.

Game made by Clara Gavinho and Lisa Maeda for  the Introduction to Game Making class, by Code Coven.
